com.techgrains.util

Class TGAndroidUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.techgrains.util.TGAndroidUtil

  • public class TGAndroidUtil
extends Object
    TGAndroidUtil is differnet than TGUtil in terms of Android classes depedencies. (i.e., Network Availability relies on Android's Application Context via ConnectivityManager.
